pageProps.content:
Experience

Latitude 0 Degrees sits among indigenous orchid-filled trees atop Makindye Hill, boasting breathtaking views over Lake Victoria & the city of Kampala.
With a convenient location only 6kms from the CBD & 45 minutes from Entebbe International Airport, Latitude 0 is the ideal stop-over before or after a gorilla trekking adventure.

Stay

This mid-sized luxury boutique hotel has 47 rooms & suites, bedecked with luxurious linens, sumptuous fabrics & furniture, & bespoke artworks.
Each room or suite has an en-suite bathroom with a full-sized bath & walk-in shower as well as fresh Ugandan coffee & French Presses.
The hotel features a wellness spa, gym & swimming pools, rooftop bar where sundowners can be enjoyed as well as private dining & entertaining spaces.

Activities

Activities at Latitude 0 include relaxing spa treatments, swimming in one of their refreshing pools, sipping cocktails at the rooftop bar, exercising at the gym or simply reading a book.

subfolders.title: Lake Victoria Serena Resort
subfolders.description: Lake Victoria Serena Resort enjoys a prime location on Lake Victoria between Kampala & Entebbe, making it the ideal overnight stop before or after a gorilla trekking expedition. The resort has been designed to echo a Roman villa.  With studded fountains, mosaics & manicured rose gardens, the Serena has several restaurants & bars, sporting facilities like tennis & volleyball courts, babysitting services & a fully equipped spa.

subfolders.title: The Boma Entebbe
subfolders.description: The Boma Entebbe is set within lush tropical gardens in one of Entebbe’s best neighbourhoods.   On your doorstep, you will find the city’s golf course, beautiful botanical gardens & the Uganda Wildlife Education Centre.
